head.title: 'Race' Was Unspoken Word In Article on Playground

hedline.hl1: 'Race' Was Unspoken Word In Article on Playground

abstract.p: Martin Schulman letter holds what was left unmentioned in July 16 article about rejection of restroom at Utopia Playground was race (S)

block.p: In your article ''Why They Spurned That Park Restroom'' (July 16), the unmentioned ''why'' in your article and in the words of the residents of the area who were against the construction and maintenance of restrooms at the Utopia Playground was ''race.''

The majority of the kids who play basketball in the park are either African-American from south of the area or Asian-American from the north, toward Flushing. The local residents are overwhelmingly white.
